title: 136. Automated Dark Kitchens
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Ofer Zinger, the co-founder of Kitchen Robotics. Barron and Zinger explore the technology behind automated ghost kitchens.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
itunes:subtitle: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Ofer Zinger, the co-founder of Kitchen Robotics. Barron and Zinger explore the technology behind automated ghost kitchens.
